title: DOJ cracks down on use of Stingrays
text:
04 DOJ cracks down on use of Stingrays 
CNN: Washington (CNN)The Justice Department on Thursday issued new guidance for how federal law enforcement can use controversial technology that dupes cellphones to collect evidence -- placing substantially more requirements on what has been a shadowy policing technique.
